Html:
Hello, guys!..
I can't get the body from some messages (e.x. multipart/signed as written in header). I've tryed 3 different ways: get_body(), like a property and get_body_stream...and no result! So, how can I do this?
signed e-mails are wrapped in an envelope. The actual body and content of the e-mail are in an attachment usually called smime.p7m or .p7s
oh, what a surprise!...thanx, and what about multipart/mixed & multipart/alternative?
